ingredients: 1 Tbsp fresh grated ginger (or minced ginger)
3 cups low-sodium vegetable or chicken broth
(Recommended) bag of spinach, bag of peas, and drained can of chickpeas
(Recommended) juice of one lemon or lime, for serving
(Recommended) tahini or Greek yogurt, for drizzling
Chopped fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems, for garnish
steps: Heat oil in the Instant Pot over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, saute until softened
Add the tomato paste and ginger, cook for 1 minute
Add the ground spices and cook for an additional minute until fragrant
Add the salt, lentils, tomatoes, and broth. Stir to combine
Stir in the peas and chickpeas. Start the rice
In the last 5 minutes, add the spinach and let wilt
Serve with citrus juice, a drizzle of tahini or Greek yogurt, and cilantro
title: Slow Cooker Lentil Curry
